summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Task Manager feature for ALKNZ Fund Management CRM. All features working correctly including task display, bell icon notification, due date picker, Fix button navigation, overdue highlighting, and auto-resolution.
passed_tests: GET /api/funds/{fund_id}/tasks returns correct task list with all required fields
PUT /api/tasks/due-date updates and persists due dates correctly
Task response includes: id, type, description, detail, investor_id, investor_name, investor_type, pipeline_stage, stage_id, status, due_date, is_overdue, priority
Tasks sorted correctly: overdue first, then by priority (high > medium > low)
Invalid task ID format returns 400 error
Task Manager tab displays correctly with task count badge (4 tasks)
Bell icon in header shows task count and clicking navigates to Task Manager tab
Task list renders correctly with all task details (description, investor name, stage badge, priority badge)
Due date picker functionality - can set and update due dates for tasks
Fix button navigates to Investor Profile tab with the investor selected in edit mode
Overdue tasks are highlighted correctly (red border, 'Overdue' badge)
Task summary stats (Total Tasks, High Priority, Overdue, With Due Date) are accurate
Tasks are auto-resolved when data issues are fixed (adding expected ticket removed the task)
critical_code_review_comments: TaskManager.jsx is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
Backend API correctly generates tasks based on validation rules (missing_investment_size, missing_expected_ticket, missing_contact)
Due date persistence uses separate collection (task_due_dates) which is good for separation of concerns
Auto-resolution works by re-evaluating validation rules on each API call - no stale task data
seed_data_creation: Updated 'Missing Ticket Corp' investor with expected_ticket_amount=750000 to test auto-resolution. Set due dates on tasks during testing.
context_for_next_testing_agent: Task Manager feature is fully functional. Current state: 3 tasks remaining (all missing_contact type). 'Missing Ticket Corp' now has expected_ticket_amount set. Due dates were set on some tasks during testing. Bell icon correctly shows task count badge.
